Uses of Package

    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup  
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup used by org.apache.hadoop.hbase 
    Class and Description
    RSGroupInfo
    Stores the group information of region server groups.
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup used by org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup 
    Class and Description
    RSGroupableBalancer
    Marker Interface.
    RSGroupAdmin
    Group user API interface used between client and server.
    RSGroupAdminServer
    Service to support Region Server Grouping (HBase-6721).
    RSGroupInfo
    Stores the group information of region server groups.
    RSGroupInfoManager
    Interface used to manage RSGroupInfo storage.
    RSGroupInfoManagerImpl.RSGroupMappingScript 
    RSGroupInfoManagerImpl.RSGroupStartupWorker 
    RSGroupInfoManagerImpl.ServerEventsListenerThread
    Calls RSGroupInfoManagerImpl.updateDefaultServers(SortedSet) to update list of known servers.
